subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush reiterates vow to veto war funding bill

04/30/07 10:09 PM, EDT
President Bush is expected to veto the war spending measure from Congress on Tuesday, reiterating his vow to reject any spending bill containing a timetable for removing U.S. troops from Iraq.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Votes, contributors make California a key player in 2008

04/30/07 09:59 PM, EDT
In past elections, presidential candidates flocked to the Golden State for the fuel that runs their campaigns: cold cash. Republican and Democratic presidential candidates were not concerned about California voters because the state's presidential primary was held long after the nominees were chosen.
FULL STORY
